description.p: Defines the number of rows to display in the Grid before alternating to the even row color.

discussion.p: When *[ui:Alternate Row Shading]* is enabled, the *[ui:Odd row band size]* property is shown. This property defines the number of rows to display using the odd row color before alternating to the even row color. The odd row color is the default background color for rows in a Grid.
See [Alternate Row Shading] for more information about customizing the row colors.
